title: Benchmarking & Peer Comparison
subtitle: Compare your CSR performance against peer companies with privacy-preserving analytics

privacy.description: All benchmark data is fully anonymised and aggregated using k-anonymity (minimum 5 companies) and differential privacy (ε=0.1). Individual company data is never disclosed.
privacy.kAnonymityDesc: Cohorts must contain at least 5 companies to prevent re-identification. Smaller cohorts are automatically blocked to protect privacy.
privacy.differentialPrivacyDesc: Mathematical noise (ε=0.1) is added to all aggregated values to protect individual contributions whilst maintaining statistical accuracy.
privacy.percentileMethodDesc: Percentile ranks show your position relative to peers: p50 is median, p90 is top 10%, p10 is bottom 10%. Higher is better for all metrics.
privacy.dataFreshnessDesc: Benchmark data is refreshed daily at 2:00 AM UTC. Cohort statistics are recalculated nightly to reflect the latest submissions.

cohortBuilder.title: Build Your Cohort
cohortBuilder.subtitle: Select filters to find peer companies for privacy-preserving benchmarking
cohortBuilder.selectFilters: Select filters to preview cohort size

consent.title: Data Sharing for Benchmarks
consent.subtitle: Control how your company's data is used in anonymised peer benchmarking
consent.intro: By opting in, your company's aggregated metrics (SROI, VIS, etc.) will be included in anonymous cohort benchmarks. This helps other companies compare their performance.

shared.dpNoise: Differential privacy noise added to all values

safeguards.title: Technical Privacy Safeguards
safeguards.kAnonymityDesc: Cohorts must have at least 5 companies to prevent re-identification
safeguards.dpDesc: Mathematical noise (ε=0.1) added to protect individual contributions
safeguards.auditDesc: All data access is logged and monitored for compliance

consent.toggleLabel: Share my company's data for benchmarks

enableConfirm.title: Enable Data Sharing?
enableConfirm.description: By enabling data sharing, your company's aggregated metrics will be included in anonymous peer benchmarks. This helps the CSR community gain better insights whilst protecting your privacy.

checklist.aggregated: All data is aggregated and anonymised
checklist.revoke: You can revoke consent at any time

disableConfirm.title: Disable Data Sharing?
disableConfirm.description: Your company's data will no longer be included in peer benchmarks. Existing aggregated data in cohorts will be recalculated without your contribution.

results.title: Your Performance vs. Peer Cohort
results.noDataDesc: Select cohort criteria above to view benchmark comparisons. Make sure your cohort has at least 5 companies to meet privacy requirements.

percentileRibbon.yourPerformance: Your performance compared to peer cohort
